Github Portfolio Website
This is my Portfolio website. It's coded in HTML5/CSS3/Javascript with SASS as the CSS precompiler. Currently hosted using Netlify. There are a number of improvements/adjustments I am working on, listed in the Github Issues.

Web Developer
Web development encompasses both front-end and back-end web development.

Front-end developers create an intuitive and accessible UI that meets the business needs to provide information using user-friendly functionality/navigation.

Back-end developers create server side applications that finds, change, and save required data and serve that data to the front end code.
What I'm Using
HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, SASS, Bootstrap, NPM, ReactJS, Django, Postgres, MySQL, Python, Linux, AWS EC2
What I'm Learning
Node.js, Express.js, React Native, d3.js, Vega
How I'm Learning
Independant Projects, Traversy Media Projects/Tutorials
Github ReactJS Tutorial (Tic-Tac-Toe)
This is the offical ReactJS tutorial (https://reactjs.org/tutorial/tutorial.html). I followed the basic tutorial for creating a Tic-Tac-Toe game through the website to gain an understanding of the ReactJS framework. There are few improvements the tutorial leaves for the reader that I have attempted in my version.
